chunk_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care
final_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care

sentences.text: my mom had 3 strokes this way.
no typical signs just a severe headache then a bloodshot eye with the first.
about 9 months later she complained of a severe headache and declined my offer to take her to the er.
the following morning she didn't know who i was or recognize her own house.
she lived for 16 more months but mentally was gone.
i... should not have read all of these right before bedtime.
my foot itches with a thousand cancers.
sudden hearing loss in one ear.
if it doesn't recover within a few hours, get yourself to er immediately.
you have about 24-26 hours during which treatment can bring your hearing back.
